biography_text: TIBERI, Patrick (Pat), a Representative from Ohio; born in Columbus, Franklin County, Ohio, October 21, 1962; graduated from Northland High School, Columbus, Ohio, 1981; B.A., Ohio State University, Columbus, Ohio, 1985; member of the Ohio state house of representatives, 1992-2001; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Seventh and to the eight succeeding Congresses until his resignation on January 15, 2018 (January 3, 2001-January 15, 2018); chair, Joint Economic Committee (One Hundred Fifteenth Congress).
